title: Bug 6009: New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard to create nested classes, the context is not set correctly.
EB: The new class wizard should set the context correctly for nested classes.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the new class wizard.
2. Select the option to create a nested class.
3. Verify that the context is not set correctly for the nested class.
